[i]Dark [/i][i]Eminence[/i] – Whenever Garon, King of Nohr enters or attacks, for each opponent, that player sacrifices a creature, if they do not, create a Treasure token.
[i]Bölverk[/i] – Whenever an opponent sacrifices a permanent, you lose 1 life and put a corruption counter onto Garon.
[i]Promote [/i]– At the beginning of your upkeep, if Garon has five or more corruption counters on him, transform him.
